languages.text: "Кто знает? Такие, как он, видят мир иначе, и не считают нужным объяснять остальным свои метафоры".

traits.locale_text: "Кто знает? Такие, как он, видят мир иначе, и не считают нужным объяснять остальным свои метафоры".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Who knows? Those like him see the world differently and see no need to explain their metaphors to others."
languages.original_text: "Кто знает? Такие, как он, видят мир иначе, и не считают нужным объяснять остальным свои метафоры".

traits.locale_text: "Who knows? Those like him see the world differently and see no need to explain their metaphors to others."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Who knows? Those like him see the world differently and see no need to explain their metaphors to others."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Who knows? Those like him see the world differently and see no need to explain their metaphors to others."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Who knows? Those like him see the world differently and see no need to explain their metaphors to others."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “谁知道呢？他们看待世界的方式与别人都不一样，他们认为没必要向别人解释他们的隐喻。”
languages.original_text: "Who knows? Those like him see the world differently and see no need to explain their metaphors to others."

traits.locale_text: “谁知道呢？他们看待世界的方式与别人都不一样，他们认为没必要向别人解释他们的隐喻。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¿Quién sabe? Los suyos ven el mundo de otra forma y no sienten la necesidad de explicar sus metáforas».
languages.original_text: "Who knows? Those like him see the world differently and see no need to explain their metaphors to others."

traits.locale_text: «¿Quién sabe? Los suyos ven el mundo de otra forma y no sienten la necesidad de explicar sus metáforas».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「さあ？彼のような者はまったく違う視点から世界を見ていて、自分の比喩をいちいち他人に説明する義務はないと思っているのだ」
languages.original_text: "Who knows? Those like him see the world differently and see no need to explain their metaphors to others."

traits.locale_text: 「さあ？彼のような者はまったく違う視点から世界を見ていて、自分の比喩をいちいち他人に説明する義務はないと思っているのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Wer weiß? Er und seinesgleichen sehen die Welt anders und halten es nicht für nötig, anderen ihre Metaphern zu erklären."
languages.original_text: "Who knows? Those like him see the world differently and see no need to explain their metaphors to others."

traits.locale_text: "Wer weiß? Er und seinesgleichen sehen wie die Welt anders und halten es nicht für nötig, anderen ihre Metaphern zu erklären."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Qui sait ? Les gens ont une vision des choses différentes de la nôtre et ne voient pas l'intérêt d'expliquer leurs métaphores aux autres. »
languages.original_text: "Who knows? Those like him see the world differently and see no need to explain their metaphors to others."

traits.locale_text: « Qui sait ? Les gens ont une vision des choses différentes de la nôtre et ne voient pas l'intérêt d'expliquer leurs métaphores aux autres. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Kim bilir? Onun gibiler, dünyayı çok farklı görür. Metaforlarını diğerlerine açıklama gereği de görmezler."
languages.original_text: "Who knows? Those like him see the world differently and see no need to explain their metaphors to others."

traits.locale_text: "Kim bilir? Onun gibiler, dünyayı çok farklı görürler. Metaforlarını diğerlerine açıklama gereği de görmezler."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
